Thomas Gieling Launches Site

2015-07-06

- 06 Jul 2015

Thomas Gieling Launches Site

Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be thanks to this wonderful tutorial at: http://jmcglone.com/guides/github-pages/

Thomas
